member.returns: The cube id in case of success, 403 if the cube is categorized in a category the user cannot edit in.

member.summary: Deletes a cube together with its associated information.
member.param: The id of the cube to be deleted.
member.returns: True in case of success, 403 if the current user cannot view the cube

member.name: M:DM_API_WS.Controllers.DMApiController.GetCSVHeader(System.Char,System.Boolean,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Char})
member.summary: Returns the header of a CSV file. If the file is not a CSV file or is empty an exception is thrown. If the file has no header, an array of string "Col 1, …, Col N" is returned.

CSV delimiter used in the file.
Whether the CSV file has a header or not.
member.returns: A list with the name of the columns to be shown in Mapping.

member.summary: Imports data in a cube (with Series, Data or SeriesAndData Import Type)
member.param: CSV separator used in the file.
CSV delimiter used in the file.
Whether the CSV file has a header or not.
Id of the mapping to whom the table refers. It is 0 if you are trying to import an SDMX file and so mapping does not exist.
Id of the cube where data are imported.
Path of the file from whom the temp table has been generated.
(Optional) Id of the mapping with time period in .STAT format.
Whether the data have to be embargoed or not.
Whether to check the coherence of attributes on FiltS table or not
